text:
Delicious ! Hidden Vegetarian Gem in a quiet  Yishun neighborhood.

I ordered Vegetarian Kway Chap For those who like strong herbal (药材味） aroma and taste。

Return again 24 / 11 / 2022. Brought my mom along to try as today is 初一。

Food ordered :

1) Vegetarian Mee Rebus. 5*
2) Vegetarian Bak Chor Mee. 4*

Worth coming back esp for the Mee Rebus. It's as good as Authentic Malay Mee Rebus.
Vegetarian longtong is the BEST, so far this is only vegetarian stall selling delicious vegetarian longtong!! Cheap as well. Always go there for mee rebus and longtong.

Quality vegetarian food! Value-for-money at $4 per dish. It's nice that most if not all dishes were still available at 11.30am.
Got bak chor mee, kway chap, lontong and mee rebus
Airy coffeeshop and friend stall holders at 630 Yishun Yi Shou vegetarian. Highly recommended for Lor Mee, sells out fast...
This is the fourth time we are here , the Mee rebus is superb. Must try . The shop uncle and aunty all look great and very polite .
